rows.label: qst711901_msg0001
rows.name:
My name is Kurogane, a
Blade to a certain Driver.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0002
rows.name:
My Driver may look adorable,
but he is a combat pro...
a so-called mercenary.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0003
rows.name:
The mission that Driver has
taken on this time is
apparently quite dangerous.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0004
rows.name:
So right now, my Driver and I are in
the middle of scouting for skilled
comrades to accompany us on the mission.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0005
rows.name:
...Still, this extraordinary
aura I feel from you all...
You seem to be quite skilled.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0006
rows.name:
How about it? Would you let
me measure your skills?

rows.label: qst711901_msg0008
rows.name:
Perform a Blade Combo up
to the second stage...
Please do this 5 times.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0009
rows.name:
Any element will do. I want you to complete
a Blade Combo 5 times, connecting a level I
Special to a level II or higher Special.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0010
rows.name:
Of course, you can connect
Specials with other teams, so
it might be good to experiment.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0011
rows.name:
Also, the location and target for the
Blade Combo don't matter, so you can
do it anywhere against any enemy.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0012
rows.name:
What, I may not look it,
but I'm good at perceiving
things through ether.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0013
rows.name:
If skilled people like you all use
a Special, I should be able to sense
it no matter where you are.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0014
rows.name: Well then, I have high hopes for you.
